title: Workshops on Quantum Psi, Hypnosis, and Fisiognomica.
first_phrase: In the last part of this text, the focus shifts to the program of the Quantum Psi system, which aims to expand consciousness through quantum methods such as light, breath, and sound. The program includes techniques for creativity, problem-solving, and even acting on the past. The section also includes a certification in Ipnomentalism, a method of subtle hypnotism that operates through intention rather than suggestion, and requires prior completion of courses in Mesmerismus and Fascination. The course also covers non-verbal communication and additional induction methods.
